text: There will be a different world champion if you exclude points from sprint races
Ferrari will win 14 or more races
Less than 15 points separating the top 3 drivers at the summer break
Hamilton does not win a race
Magnussen will score at least 15 points
Schumacher makes Q3 at least 3 times
The new wheel covers cause at least 2 pitstop problems
At least one race has less than 50% race distance completed before being called off
Either championship is decided in the last race
The team in the lead at the summer break is NOT the same team that wins the championship
